name: MTLSamplerMipFilter
desc: Filtering options for determining what pixel value is returned with multiple mipmap levels.

items.name: case notMipmapped
items.desc: The texture is sampled from mipmap level 0, and other mipmap levels are ignored.

items.name: case nearest
items.desc: The nearest mipmap level is selected.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: If the filter falls between mipmap levels, both levels are sampled and the results are determined by linear interpolation between levels.
